rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for the Stillshroud enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature, player, or planeswalker and you gain
3 life.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
{3}{W}{B}: Until end of turn, Impaled Ruins becomes a 3/5 white and black Elemental creature with lifelink. It’s still a land.
